scripts.build:all: find . -maxdepth 1 -type d -name "GitHub-*" -exec bash -c "cd '{}' && cfn generate && npm install && npm run build" \;
scripts.build:docs-cp-docs: find . -maxdepth 1 -type d -name "GitHub-*" -exec bash -c "mkdir -p docs/user/generated/resources/{} && cp {}/docs/* docs/user/generated/resources/{}/" \;
scripts.build:docs-cp-extras: find . -maxdepth 1 -type d -name "GitHub-*" -exec bash -c "mkdir -p docs/user/generated/resources/{} && cp {}/docs-extra/* docs/user/generated/resources/{}/" \;
scripts.build:docs: npm run build:docs-clean ; npm run build:docs-cp-docs && npm run build:docs-cp-extras
